spec_data.Name: perl-Test-CPAN-Meta-YAML
spec_data.Description:
This module was written to ensure that a META.yml file, provided with a
standard distribution uploaded to CPAN, meets the specifications that are
slowly being introduced to module uploads, via the use of ExtUtils::MakeMaker,
Module::Build and Module::Install.

See CPAN::Meta for further details of the CPAN Meta Specification.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:30:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Validate a META.yml file within a CPAN distribution
